definition: structural particle: used after a verb (or adjective as main verb), linking it to following phrase indicating effect, degree, possibility etc
to have to/must/ought to/to need to
to obtain/to get/to gain/to catch (a disease)/proper/suitable/proud/contented/to allow/to permit/ready/finished

sentences.english: However, I am very sure that the mountain in front of me must recognize her baby.
sentences.chinese: 但是，眼前這青山定是依然識得我。

sentences.english: By the side of sickness health begos sweet.
sentences.chinese: 和疾病相較量，才能識得健康的可愛。

sentences.english: Miho gold I know for three years.
sentences.chinese: 我和金子美穗識得已有三年咗。

sentences.english: I did not know Cantonese at all and knew Mandarin only a little.
sentences.chinese: 廣東話我一竅不通，中文也只識得少許。

sentences.english: None of them along the line know what any of it is worth.
sentences.chinese: 但他們沒人識得這些的價值所在。
